definition: to encircle/to surround/all around/to wear by wrapping around (scarf, shawl)

sentences.english: The town was forced to yield after a long siege.
sentences.chinese: 该城受长期围困而被迫弃守。

sentences.english: Theywould try to besiege Nanjing again.
sentences.chinese: 他们会尝试再次围困南京。

sentences.english: The evil Decepticons have set their sights on Chicago, where Carly is trapped.
sentences.chinese: 邪恶的霸天虎已经盯上了芝加哥，卡莉被围困的地方。

sentences.english: Our warships bottled up the enemy fleet in the harbour.
sentences.chinese: 我方军舰把敌方舰队围困在港口内。

sentences.english: We bottled the enemy up like turtles in a jar.
sentences.chinese: 我们把敌人围困得象瓮中之鳖。

sentences.english: Very little resistance was put up by the surrounded men.
sentences.chinese: 被围困者基本上没有进行反抗。

sentences.english: The trapped men shot out through the windows at their attackers.
sentences.chinese: 那些被围困的人从窗户里向进攻者开火。

sentences.english: The insect is trapped and drowns in the water and digestive juices at the bottom of the pitcher.
sentences.chinese: 昆虫被围困，淹没在瓶状叶底部的水和消化液里。

sentences.english: Besieged between the state of Chen and Cai, Confucius and his disciples had not cooked for seven days.
sentences.chinese: 孔子一行人被围困在陈蔡之间已经七天没有吃热食了。

sentences.english: And Omri went up from Gibbethon, and all Israel with him, and they besieged Tirzah.
sentences.chinese: 暗利率领以色列众人从基比顿上去，围困得撒。

sentences.english: The ants have cornered the rustler and are attacking it.
sentences.chinese: 蚂蚁把大虫围困起来并展开进攻。

sentences.english: Troy was besieged by the Greeks for ten years.
sentences.chinese: 特洛伊城被希腊人围困了10年。

sentences.english: Civilian trap in the beleaguer city has been airlifted to safety.
sentences.chinese: 被围困在城里的老百姓已空运到安全地区。

sentences.english: Through the leaves of every trial there are chinks of light to shine through.
sentences.chinese: 试炼虽然围困我们，仍有许多隙缝可以透光进来的。

sentences.english: The city was kept under siege until the eleventh year of King Zedekiah.
sentences.chinese: 于是城被围困直到西底家王十一年。

sentences.english: How did the people of Megiddo defend themselves during a siege?
sentences.chinese: 美吉多人在遭受围困时如何自卫？

definition: to stand a siege/trapped in a besieged city
to besiege/to beleaguer/to attack from all sides/to jointly speak or write against sb
to guard/to hold a fortified position/entrenched
to come to the aid of/to save/to rescue from danger/to relieve
to retreat and defend/to withdraw and maintain one's guard
to annihilate/to wipe out completely/to exterminate
